CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Boreal_SLIMF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Boreal_SLIMF_Hectares__c )+ IF( ISBLANK(Conservation_Purposes_SLIMF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Conservation_Purposes_SLIMF_Hectares__c ) + IF( ISBLANK(Temperate_SLIMF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Temperate_SLIMF_Hectares__c ) + IF( ISBLANK(Tropical_SLIMF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Tropical_SLIMF_Hectares__c ) + IF( ISBLANK(Plantations_SLIMF_Hectares__c) , 0, Plantations_SLIMF_Hectares__c)
CustomField.label: Total (SLIMF) (Hectares)
